sentences.english: Objective To observe the JLT efficacy of treatment of traumatic brain injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察猪苓汤治疗颅脑损伤的疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusion treatment of traumatic brain injury JLT results were satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 结论猪苓汤治疗颅脑损伤疗效满意。

sentences.english: The mycelia of Polyporus umbellatus (Pers. ) Fr. were cultured by superficial solution culture.
sentences.chinese: 通过人工液体浅层培养的方法成功培养出猪苓菌丝体。

sentences.english: In the performance of health care, polyporus had a good prospect.
sentences.chinese: 猪苓在医疗方面表现出良好的应用前景。

sentences.english: Grifola umbellate could also absorb nutrition from the earth.
sentences.chinese: 猪苓自身也具有从周围环境中吸收营养物质的能力。

definition: the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
